page.title: 01A GENERAL INTRODUCTION
page.content: The area that the children of Whitbourne School have studied is a {rural area}incorporating the two villages of{Broadwas}and {Whitbourne.}The land is undulating and used mainly for crops including many {orchards.}There is also much{natural {woodland}and it is considered to be a area of{scenic beauty.} We have chosen to concentrate on our own village and our text relates to life as it is lived today.The accounts are those of the children living in a pretty and thriving village.The{population consists of a cross_section of people involved in{local farming}and in {commuting}to larger towns in the area. Buildings can be found dating from the middle ages to the present time and the village has a thriving church and school.
